title: RESX Resource Indexing
summary: Defines how .resx files are detected, parsed, normalized, and indexed as 1:1 resource chunks (Reference/Resource) for RAG.
goals: Treat each RESX <data> element as its own chunk
Classify resource chunks as RagContentType=Reference, SubKind=Resource
Capture key, value, comment, culture, and light usage aggregates
Integrate RESX processing into the normalized chunk builder workflow
nonGoals: Modeling full resource-to-code usage maps (handled by IDX-0052)

integration.notes: Runs as a non-Roslyn XML parser that produces 1:1 ResxResourceChunk instances for each <data> element.
